Name: PUNCH & ASSOCIATES INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT, INC.
ZUCKERMAN INVESTMENT GROUP, LLC
SANDERS MORRIS HARRIS LLC
FIRST MANHATTAN CO
MILLENNIUM MANAGEMENT LLC
Description:
First Manhattan Co. (FMC) was founded in 1964 by a group of financial industry executives led by Sandy Gottesman. FMC remains an owner-operated investment advisory firm.  Robert Gottesman, David Gottesman's son, is currently the firm's CEO.
FMC is based in New York City.

Millennium Management is an investment management firm with a multistrategy hedge fund offering. It is one of the world's largest alternative asset management firms with $39 billion assets under management. The firm operates in America, Europe and Asia.
